item.title: Live updates: Trump warns Republicans could face political fallout for a tax hike on rich

item.title: Chinese exports, aided by tariff dodging, defy Trump’s trade pressure
Trump suggests lowering tariffs on China ahead of talks
item.description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent is expected to meet with his counterparts in Switzerland this weekend.

item.title: ICE moves detainees to Texas facility where judge declined to halt deportations
ICE moves detainees to Texas facility where judge declined to halt deportations
item.description: One Philadelphia man was transferred to Texas in apparent violation of a court order requiring that he be kept in Pennsylvania as his case played out ...
